H.text: Betty Friedan is the author of "The Feminine Mystique."
H.ref: ON FRIEDAN, A FEMINIST CRITIQUE (BEGIN ITALICS HERE) In The Guardian, Germaine Greer took critical measure of a fellow feminist, Betty Friedan, the author of "The Feminine Mystique," who died on Feb. 4 at 85.

H.text: Betty Friedan died on February 4, 2006.
H.ref: ON FRIEDAN, A FEMINIST CRITIQUE (BEGIN ITALICS HERE) In The Guardian, Germaine Greer took critical measure of a fellow feminist, Betty Friedan, the author of "The Feminine Mystique," who died on Feb. 4 at 85.

H.text: Betty Friedan died at 85.
H.ref: ON FRIEDAN, A FEMINIST CRITIQUE (BEGIN ITALICS HERE) In The Guardian, Germaine Greer took critical measure of a fellow feminist, Betty Friedan, the author of "The Feminine Mystique," who died on Feb. 4 at 85.

H.text: Gloria Steinem was a feminist.
H.ref: Those of us who came of age with the feminist movement wanted to be a Gloria Steinem kind of feminist.

H.text: Betty Friedan was eulogized as a feminist pioneer.
H.ref: Betty Friedan, who championed the once-radical assertion that women needed more than husbands and children to find fulfillment, was eulogized Monday as a feminist pioneer and loving mother _ if not always an easy one to live with.

H.text: Betty Friedan was eulogized as a loving mother.
H.ref: Betty Friedan, who championed the once-radical assertion that women needed more than husbands and children to find fulfillment, was eulogized Monday as a feminist pioneer and loving mother _ if not always an easy one to live with.

H.text: Betty Friedan's ideals have had substantial impact on the women's movement in Taiwan.
H.ref: Paying tribute to the late pioneer of the modern U.S. feminist movement Betty Friedan, who died Feb. 4, the leaders said Friedan's ideals have had substantial impact on the women's movement in Taiwan, but it is still difficult to implement Friedan's later aspiration to have women succeed with both family lives and careers.

H.text: It is difficult for Taiwanese women to strike a balance between their family lives and careers.
H.ref: It is still difficult for Taiwanese women to strike a balance between their family lives and careers, the leaders of various Taiwanese women's groups said Tuesday.

H.text: "The Feminine Mystique" was published in 1963.
H.ref: The obituaries for Betty Friedan, whose 1963 book, "The Feminine Mystique," revived an American feminism then thought to be extinct and unnecessary, were striking in their recognition of how much explanation is now required about the world before the women's movement.

H.text: Betty Friedan triggered profound changes.
H.ref: Today should not pass without recalling the impact of Betty Friedan and the profound changes triggered by her incisive appeal for women to reject the "contented" homemaker role of the 1950s and insist on fuller participation in American life.

H.text: Betty Friedan made an appeal for women to reject the "contented" homemaker role.
H.ref: Today should not pass without recalling the impact of Betty Friedan and the profound changes triggered by her incisive appeal for women to reject the "contented" homemaker role of the 1950s and insist on fuller participation in American life.

H.text: Iacoboni and his colleagues used fast magnetic resonance imaging technology to observe brain responses to commercials shown during the Super Bowl.
H.ref: Iacoboni and his colleagues used fast magnetic resonance imaging technology to observe brain responses to commercials shown during the Super Bowl.

H.text: Friedan's message about the cultural nature of women's subordination was not well received initially.
H.ref: Friedan's message about the cultural nature of women's subordination was not well received initially.

H.text: In The Guardian, Germaine Greer took critical measure of Betty Friedan.

H.text: Betty Friedan had a thing about floor care.
H.ref: Betty Friedan had a thing about floor care.

H.text: Betty Friedan's most important heritage is her facilitation of women's employment.
H.ref: "Betty Friedan's most important heritage is her facilitation of women's employment.

H.text: In 1962, Judy Mott was laid off from her job with Sears.
H.ref: Cox News Service DAYTON, Ohio -- In 1962, when she was six months' pregnant with her first child, Judy Mott was laid off from her job with Sears.

H.text: In 1962, Judy Mott was pregnant with her first child.
H.ref: Cox News Service DAYTON, Ohio -- In 1962, when she was six months' pregnant with her first child, Judy Mott was laid off from her job with Sears.

H.text: According to Muriel Fox, Friedan was the most influential woman of the second millennium.
H.ref: "I truly believe that Betty Friedan was the most influential woman, not only of the 20th century but of the second millennium," said Muriel Fox, one of the co-founders with Friedan of the National Organization for Women.

H.text: Betty Friedan is one of the co-founders of the National Organization for Women.
H.ref: "I truly believe that Betty Friedan was the most influential woman, not only of the 20th century but of the second millennium," said Muriel Fox, one of the co-founders with Friedan of the National Organization for Women.

H.text: Betty Friedan died of congestive heart failure.
H.ref: Colleagues from the American women's movement as well as her three children and their families were among more than 300 mourners at the funeral for Friedan, who died of congestive heart failure Saturday on her 85th birthday.

H.text: Betty Friedan had three children.
H.ref: Colleagues from the American women's movement as well as her three children and their families were among more than 300 mourners at the funeral for Friedan, who died of congestive heart failure Saturday on her 85th birthday.
